features: ==A Treat For Your Skin== Nourish and pamper your skin with our delightful Body Massage Oil. Infused with Vitamin E, this luxurious oil not only provides a silky-smooth glide during massages but also leaves your skin feeling soft, supple, and irresistibly touchable. Experience the pleasure of a massage while indulging in the captivating glow that our oil brings to your skin.

==PH Balance== Experience fast relief and regain your natural pH balance with our all-natural Yoni Oil. Infused with soothing essential oils, this oil provides gentle healing without the use of harsh chemicals. Embrace the delicate floral scent that lingers and enjoy the refreshing sensation it brings. Achieve a pH balance of 4.5 to 5, and feel the difference in your comfort, confidence, and overall well-being.

==All Natural Ingredients== Unleash the power of nature with our Yoni oil. Enriched with real rose petals, rosehip oil, rose oil, shea butter, jojoba oil, and lauric acid, these soap bars are a testament to the purity of our ingredients. With our Yoni Oil, you'll benefit from a unique blend of rose essential oil, lavender oil, mugwort leaf oil, magnolia officinalis oil, clove oil, and angelica oil. Experience natural relief from itching, dryness, odor, and vaginal discomfort.

==Usage== Achieving a natural pH balance is simple with our Yoni Oil. Start by applying 1-2 pumps onto a clean, dry finger. Gently massage the oil onto the outer vaginal area, distributing it evenly for optimal effect. Alternatively, apply the oil indirectly onto a panty liner or pad for added convenience. Experience the ease and effectiveness of our Yoni Oil, providing you with comfort and confidence all day long.

==Sinfully Delicious Flavor== Unleash your taste buds and ignite your senses with our Sinfully Delicious Edible Massage Oil. Experience the ultimate care for your intimate area with our Yoni Care Oil. Designed to provide cleansing, softening, and relief, this set is a natural solution for maintaining a balanced pH level and promoting overall vaginal health. Discover the power of natural ingredients and indulge in a fresh, confident, and comfortable feeling.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This yoni soap smell so good and the yoni oil
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This soap came nicely packaged it smell really good I used it it’s kinda strong but it other up really good I love the yoni oil so much better it smell just like pineapple and it’s not as strong as the soap the soap have a really good lather and the advertisement didn’t lie

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this yoni oil because my sis had some and always wanted to try some now she had on with a body wash I’m a bar soap kind of girl. When I tell I love this stuff for saving my life before I started using this yoni oil & bar soap my periods would be 14 days or longer my period is back normal 5 to 6 days I do no bleed heavy anymore my doctor couldn’t even figure out what was wrong with me besides the fact that I’m bbw and should lose some weight. Thank you so much for making this yoni oil I’m def a repeat customer.

reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Missed the mark
reviews.reviewText: Usually I like Yoni products but this pineapple did not do the trick for me, the liquid doesn't have a clean pineapple scent, it smells to chemical to me. The bar of soap smells a little bit more of a natural pineapple smell but I'm not going to use the pineapple scent one.
